item.title: Stock futures are flat as traders assess new Trump tariff threats: Live updates
item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average hit a fresh all-time high and closed at another record on Monday.

item.title: Europe markets lower; autos down 2% as investors digest Trump tariff threats
item.description: European stocks were lower as investors assess the global implications of Donald Trump's plans to hike tariffs on China, Mexico and Canada.
